title: Talking Heads - Live in Rome (1980) [DiVX]
description:
This is another great show from the Adrian Belew era of the Talking Heads. The filming is much different than the Germany show from the same tour, this is much more in your face and the Italians use many different and interesting camera angles.

Source: Direct capture to the hard drive of the May 2005 rebroadcast on Italian TV - except for "The Great Curve", which was not included in the rebroadcast.

 1. Intro
 2. Psycho Killer
 3. Stay Hungry
 4. Cities
 5. I Zimbra
 6. Drugs
 7. Take me to the River
 8. Crosseyed and Painless
 9. Life During Wartime
10. Houses in Motion
11. Born Under Punches
12. The Great Curve

Running Time: 65min

DVD Rip

Video: DivX 5 628x466 29.97fps
Audio: MPEG Audio Layer 3 48000Hz stereo 128Kbps
